Android Programming & Design

Course Schedule

Weekly Course Schedule

This course introduces students to Android application development and design principles. Students will learn the fundamentals of the Android platform, including Activities, Services, Content Providers, and Broadcast Receivers. The course covers UI design with Layouts and Fragments, data persistence, networking, and integration with device features like location and sensors. Students…

Duration: 16 weeks (January 27 - May 16, 2026)

Week 1: Android Fundamentals & Setup

Dates: January 27 - February 02, 2026

Topics

  • Course Overview & Requirements

  • Android Architecture & Ecosystem

  • Android Studio Installation & Configuration

  • Creating Your First Android Project

Learning Objectives

  • Understand the Android platform architecture

  • Install and configure Android development environment

  • Create and run a basic Android application

  • Navigate Android Studio IDE

Course Materials

Lectures:

  • week-01-introduction

  • week-01-architecture

Assignments:

  • assignment-01-setup

Resources:

  • android-studio-guide

  • android-architecture

Week 2: Activities & Intents

Dates: February 03 - February 09, 2026

Topics

  • Activity Lifecycle

  • Intent Objects

  • Starting Activities

  • Handling Results from Activities

Learning Objectives

  • Understand Activity lifecycle and state transitions

  • Use Intents to navigate between Activities

  • Pass data between Activities

  • Handle Activity results

Course Materials

Lectures:

  • week-02-activities

  • week-02-intents

Assignments:

Resources:

Week 3: Layouts & UI Widgets

Dates: February 10 - February 16, 2026

Topics

  • Layout Types (LinearLayout, RelativeLayout, ConstraintLayout)

  • Common Widgets (Button, EditText, TextView)

  • Event Listeners & User Input

  • Responsive Design

Learning Objectives

  • Build UI layouts with XML

  • Use various layout managers effectively

  • Handle user input and events

  • Design responsive layouts

Important Dates

| Date | Event | |——|——-|

January 27, 2026 Course Starts
March 16, 2026 Midterm Exam
March 23, 2026 Spring Break Begins
March 30, 2026 Spring Break Ends
May 16, 2026 Final Presentations & Course Ends

Exams

  • Midterm Exam (Week 7): March 16, 2026
    • Content: Weeks 1-6
    • Format: Practical
  • Final Exam (Week 16): May 16, 2026
    • Content: Comprehensive (Weeks 1-16)
    • Format: Final Project Presentation

Holidays & Breaks

  • Spring Break: March 23 - March 30, 2026

Note: This schedule is subject to change at the instructor’s discretion. Students will be notified of any significant changes via course announcements.
